translation.en: Do this, and I will help you to survive what is coming next.
translation.es: Haga esto, y lo ayudaréa sobrevivir lo que sigue.

translation.en: FBI's here for him now. What?
I told you I had calls in.
translation.es: Te dije que hice algunas llamadas.

translation.en: We're handing him over, so we can all go home.
translation.es: Lo entregaremos para quetodos podamos irnos a casa.

translation.en: Did they say who he was? A known terrorist.
translation.es: -¿Ellos te dijeron quién era él?-Un conocido terrorista.

translation.en: Someone they've been after for a while.
translation.es: Alguien a quien están persiguiendodesde hace un tiempo.

translation.en: Where are they? Lobby.
I'll take care of it.
I'll bring them to him, pass him off.
translation.es: Los llevaré con él,y se los entregaré.

translation.en: Gentlemen, you're here for the prisoner.
translation.es: Caballeros, ustedes vinierona buscar al prisionero.

translation.en: Commander Hall. I'm Agent Franklin. My partner, Agent Cox.
translation.es: Comandante Hall. Soy el agenteFranklin. Mi socio, el agente Cox.

translation.en: Sorry for the delay. No problem.
We appreciate you hanging on to our guy.
Right this way.
That's funny, I thought all you FBI guys used Berettas.
translation.es: Qué raro, pensé que todoslos agentes del FBI usaban Beretta.

translation.en: These are our personal weapons.
On the job? It's a holiday.
So what'd this guy do to get on your database, anyway?
translation.es: ¿Qué hizo este tipopara entrar en su base de datos?

translation.en: Terrorist stuff. Things we're not to discuss.
"Terrorist stuff." What's his name?
Heh. Come on. His name can't be a matter of national security.
translation.es: Vamos. Su nombre no puede serun asunto de seguridad nacional.

translation.en: Well, look, it's clear you guys aren't FBI, so no fooling.
translation.es: Bueno, miren, está claro que ustedesno son del FBI, basta de tonterías.

translation.en: Who are you?
Just hand the prisoner over.
Not until I get some answers.
translation.es: No hasta que tenga algunas respuestas.

translation.en: You are dead, motherfucker.
Drop the knife now! Now! Oh, fuck.
CHU: Hands on your head.
Knees.
You all right, Commander? Prick.
Got him? Yeah, we got him.
Commander? Commander!
You trust me now?
CHU: Hooks.
Hands on your head.
Let's go.
You all right, Commander? Yeah, yeah.
WARD: Keep moving.
Keys, cowboy.
I'm going to enjoy watching you die.
Shut the fuck up.
Everything happened the way he said it would.
Our mystery man's not even in the FBI's database.
translation.es: Nuestro hombre misterioso ni siquieraestá en la base de datos del FBI.

translation.en: Wait. How do you know that?
translation.es: Nuestro hombre misterioso ni siquieraestá en la base de datos del FBI. Espera. ¿Cómo lo sabes?

translation.en: You hacked the FBI database?
Just a bit.
Look, on the way to the shipping center,
translation.es: Mira, cuando íbamosal centro de transporte...

translation.en: I made a crack to Agent Weir about this being the calm before the storm,
translation.es: ...le dije a Weir que esto erala calma antes de la tormenta...

translation.en: and he said there wasn't gonna be a storm.
translation.es: ...y él dijo que no ibaa haber una tormenta.

translation.en: I don't think they were expecting any resistance,
translation.es: No creo que esperaranningún tipo de resistencia...

translation.en: which is odd, don't you think? It doesn't matter.
translation.es: -...lo cual es raro, ¿no te parece?-Eso no importa.

translation.en: There is a protocol we need to follow-- Oh, fuck the protocol, Ellen!
translation.es: -Tenemos que seguir un protocolo...-¡Al diablo con el protocolo, Ellen!

translation.en: This isn't the end of it.
translation.es: Este no el fin de esto.

translation.en: We lost enough guys today. I don't wanna lose more.
translation.es: Ya perdimos suficientes hombres hoy.No quiero perder más.

translation.en: You're a cop, right? At least you were before you put the jacket on.
translation.es: Eres policía, ¿no? Al menos lo erasantes de ponerte la chaqueta.

translation.en: What does your gut tell you?
Let's see what he has to say.
TRAVIS: You know this man?
He actually just tried to kill me to get to you.
SCORPION: I've never seen him before, but I know more like him will be coming.
translation.es: Nunca antes lo había visto,pero sé que vendrán más como él.

translation.en: Many more. Why won't you tell us your name?
translation.es: -Muchos más.-¿Por qué no nos dice su nombre?

translation.en: That is for your protection.
The less you know... TRAVIS: Well...
The ink on your back's not Sao Paulo Locos,
translation.es: ...el tatuaje de tu espaldano es de los Locos de São Paulo...

translation.en: nor does it rep any of their rivals, so you're clearly not a part of that game.
translation.es: ...ni de ninguno de sus rivales,así que claramente no eres parte de eso.

translation.en: My guess is you're Special Ops.
translation.es: Yo creo quees de Operaciones Especiales.

translation.en: You've been tortured, from the looks of it, more than once.
translation.es: Lo torturaron, a juzgar porlo que se ve, más de una vez.

translation.en: You could have easily escaped our compound,
translation.es: Fácilmente podría haberse escapadode aquí, pero optó por no hacerlo.

translation.en: but you chose not to. Why?
translation.es: Fácilmente podría haberse escapadode aquí, pero optó por no hacerlo. ¿Por qué?

translation.en: You need our protection
because everyone and their mother's coming after you
because what you know
could cause blowback.
It is far more complicated than that.
translation.es: Es mucho más complicado que eso.

translation.en: Fill me in here. What am I missing?
Because I believe you when you say more like him are coming.
translation.es: Porque le creo cuando diceque vendrán más como él.

translation.en: But you're gonna have to square-up with me
translation.es: Pero usted tendrá queajustar cuentas conmigo...

translation.en: if you want us to do more than just turn you over.
translation.es: ...si quiere que nosotros hagamosalgo más que entregarlo.

translation.en: You were correct about Special Ops,
translation.es: Tiene razón respectoa lo de Operaciones Especiales...

translation.en: but that was only in the beginning.
translation.es: ...pero eso fue solo en el comienzo.

translation.en: I quickly realized that information was true power.
translation.es: Rápidamente me di cuenta quela información era el verdadero poder.

translation.en: So you're a spy. And I have the goods on everyone.
translation.es: -Entonces es espía.-Y tengo información de todos.

translation.en: What is it?
I traced the cell phone. LARS: Who is it?
translation.es: -Pude rastrear el teléfono celular.-¿De quién es?

translation.en: I don't have a "who",
but I have where the call originated from.
translation.es: ...pero tengo el lugardonde se originó la llamada.

translation.en: Okay. So, what happened? How'd you end up in our cell?
translation.es: De acuerdo. Entonces, ¿qué sucedió?¿Cómo terminó en nuestra celda?

translation.en: made a mistake in Bogotá.
So why'd they capture you? Why not kill you?
translation.es: ¿Por qué lo capturaron?¿Por qué no lo mataron?

translation.en: To facilitate my sale.
ELLEN: Bullshit. The S.P.L. knows their lane.
translation.es: Mentira. Los L.S.P. conocen su camino. No sontan tontos para cambiar ese juego.

translation.en: They're not dumb enough to trade in that game.
translation.es: Los L.S.P. conocen su camino. No sontan tontos para cambiar ese juego.

translation.en: No, but others do.
Who, then? Unsure.
SCORPION: But one thing I am sure of:
translation.es: Pero tengo certeza de una cosa:

translation.en: Someone from your team is involved.
translation.es: alguien de su equipo está involucrado.

translation.en: LARS: Nicholas, who are these people?
Show me who we're up against.
Where you going, Travis?
Commander? I'm moving him.
Where?
Not alone. The team should be in on this.
translation.es: No irás solo.El equipo debería estar en esto.

translation.en: Just me. What, are you crazy?
That doesn't make any sense. Nothing about today makes sense.
translation.es: -Eso no tiene sentido.-Hoy nada tiene sentido.

translation.en: If I tell you where I'm going,
they could get it out of you. They wouldn't be able to.
translation.es: -...podrían sacártelo a la fuerza.-No podrían hacerlo.

translation.en: They're coming for him, Sof,
and they're not gonna stop.
I won't let another person I care about die today.
translation.es: No voy a permitir que hoy mueraotra persona a la que quiero.

translation.en: If they know he's here, they could be watching the compound, and--
translation.es: Si saben que está aquí,podrían vigilar el complejo, y...

translation.en: I'll have Elson review the area.
translation.es: Haré que Elson revise el área.

translation.en: Thanks.
I'm moving you.
Moving me will not keep them from coming for me.
translation.es: Trasladarme no impediráque vengan por mí.

translation.en: No, but it'll keep them from my team,
translation.es: No, pero los alejará de mi equipo...

translation.en: and that's my priority.
It's how it's gotta be.
Yo, Commander, what's going on?
Hey. Just saw Hall taking Scorpion out.
translation.es: Oye. Acabo de ver a Hallsacando a Escorpión de aquí.

translation.en: What do you mean, "out"?
It's him.
Hello? MAN [ALTERED VOICE]: Listen to me carefully.
You don't have much time.
How we looking?
Yeah, yeah. Everything looks good. No unusual activity.
translation.es: Sí, sí. Todo se ve bien.Ninguna actividad inusual.

translation.en: SOPHIA: "Remote access error." What is that?
ELSON: That? I don't know.
That has been bugging me all day.
translation.es: Eso me estuvo molestando todo el día.

translation.en: MAN [ON COMM]: I'm in position.
Did you disable the camera that shows our sniper?
translation.es: ¿Desconectaste la cámaraque muestra a nuestro francotirador?

translation.en: What I did was record footage before he got there,
translation.es: Lo que hice fue hacer una grabaciónde antes que él llegara...

translation.en: and just have it playing back on a continuous loop.
translation.es: ...y lo que estoy haciendoes reproducirla en forma continua.

translation.en: A simple "yes" would suffice.
Is he clear? Yes.
Yes.
Think they're watching? They are definitely watching.
Travis, stop!
What are you doing?
You said you didn't want anyone else to die.
translation.es: Tú dijiste que no queríasque muriera nadie más.

translation.en: Yeah, and that included you.
translation.es: Sí, y eso te incluye a ti.

translation.en: I'll radio when I'm safe.
translation.es: Enviaré un mensajecuando esté a salvo.

translation.en: TRAVIS: Let's go.
I was personally put in charge of Glen Damone's protection. Know who that is?
translation.es: Estuve a cargo de la protecciónde Glen Damone. ¿Sabe quién es?

translation.en: The mafia accountant.
Trial lasted five months, no less than 20 bounties on his head.
translation.es: El juicio duró cinco meses, su cabezano tenía menos de 20 recompensas.

translation.en: He never got one scratch under my watch.
translation.es: Nunca sufrió ni un rasguñoa mi cargo.

translation.en: Wait. Wasn't he assassinated shortly after the trial?
translation.es: Espere. ¿Acaso no fue asesinadopoco tiempo después del juicio?

translation.en: That was on Witness Protection, not me.
translation.es: Eso fue con Protecciónde Testigos, no conmigo.

translation.en: Watch your head.
When they clear the compound, take out the driver.
translation.es: Cuando salgan del complejo,mata al conductor.

translation.en: If anyone kills Scorpion, they die next. MAN [ON COMM]: Roger that.
MAN: They're leaving the facility. Take him out.
You'd be wise to take cover. What?
Duck!
Oh, shit. They're under attack.
We gotta go. WARD: Let's move!
Where are you going? To help.
You're not field. Help from here. Find out where the backup is!
translation.es: -No eres de campo. Ayuda desde aquí.-Averigua dónde está el refuerzo.

translation.en: WOMAN: Dispatch. This is Seattle S.W.A.T.
We're under heavy attack and need immediate assistance.
translation.es: Nos están atacandoy necesitamos asistencia inmediata.

translation.en: WOMAN: Roger that, Seattle S.W.A.T.
Hang tight.
Backup's on its way.
SCORPION: Commander?
Go! Go! Go!
I've got the shot.
translation.es: Tengo el objetivo en el blanco.

translation.en: Not on my shift, motherfucker.
Fuck!
Do not let him get away!
Commander, nice of you to join us.
TRAVIS: Son of a bitch.
Back to the compound. Move it. Now!
Holy fuck.
MAN 1: Left, left, left.
Clear. MAN 2: Clear! Go!
Get the truck out.
Everyone, inside! Gutierrez, I'm on the move!
Go, go!
Dwyer, shut us down!
I'm on it. Shut us down now!
What part of "we need him alive" do they not understand?
Are those shields?
Well, you have to admire their resilience.
Nicholas,
can you open them?
It's one thing to hack their comms and cameras,
translation.es: Una cosa es hackearsus comunicaciones y sus cámaras...

translation.en: but shields are controlled by the internal mainframe.
translation.es: ...pero los escudos están controladospor la computadora central.

translation.en: It'd need to be taken out before I can do anything.
translation.es: Necesitamos desconectarloantes que yo pueda hacer algo.

translation.en: LARS: Find a way past those shields.
translation.es: Encuentra la manerade atravesar esos escudos.

translation.en: Leave the rest to me. In the meantime, kill the power.
translation.es: Déjame el resto a mí.Mientras tanto, corta la energía.

translation.en: Kill everything.
Ready the next wave, and let's see how resilient they truly are.
translation.es: Prepara la próxima etapa, y veamoscuán resilientes son realmente.

translation.en: Got that?
TRAVIS: Where's the backup, Elson?
What the fuck happened?
Hold up, hold up. What are you doing?
I assure you, Inspector, what's out there is far more dangerous to you than me.
translation.es: Se lo aseguro, inspectora, lo que estáahí afuera es más peligroso que yo.

translation.en: They're only dangerous to us because of you.
translation.es: Son peligrosos para nosotrosúnicamente por usted.

translation.en: You brought this to our door, all of it, and I can end it right now.
translation.es: Usted trajo esto hasta nuestra puerta,y yo puedo ponerle fin ahora mismo.

translation.en: And you think killing me will stop this war?
translation.es: ¿Usted cree que matarme a mídetendrá esta guerra?

translation.en: Ellen, this isn't who we are.
Now what? What's going on, Elson?
ELSON: Yeah, they cut the comm and power, and judging by the signal on my cell,
translation.es: Sí, cortaron comunicaciones y energía,y a juzgar por la señal de mi celular...

translation.en: they're jamming the cell tower too.
Fuck. Any satellite phones on-site?
translation.es: -...también bloquearon la torre celular.-Diablos. ¿Tenemos algún teléfono satelital aquí?

translation.en: ELSON: Yeah, none that are working.
Why are cameras working but not Internet or phones?
translation.es: Redirigiendo la Transmisión ¿Por qué funcionan las cámaras,pero no la Internet o los teléfonos?

translation.en: In cases like this, you wanna see.
translation.es: En casos como este, uno quiere ver.

translation.en: So we put security separate on the internal mainframe.
translation.es: Así que pusimos seguridaden la computadora central interna.

translation.en: And they would want to see as well.
They hacked the security cameras.
They can do that? It's not that hard.
For somebody who's good enough, it's not.
translation.es: No lo es para alguienque sea lo suficientemente bueno.

translation.en: TRAVIS: Cut the interior security cameras.
Don't let them see what we're doing.
translation.es: -No permitas que vean lo que hacemos.-Entendido.

translation.en: ELSON: Copy that.
translation.es: -No permitas que vean lo que hacemos.-Entendido. Cámaras de SeguridadInternas

translation.en: SCORPION: You must get this through your skulls.
translation.es: SIN SEÑAL DE VIDEO Métanse esto en sus cabezas.

translation.en: These are professional soldiers. They will isolate you, intimidate you
translation.es: Estos son soldados profesionales.Los aislarán, los intimidarán...

translation.en: until they find your weakest link and then exploit it.
translation.es: ...hasta encontrar su puntodébil y lo explotarán.

translation.en: I thought you said the phones were out. They are.
translation.es: -Creí que los teléfonos no funcionaban.-Así es.

translation.en: TRAVIS [ON PHONE]: Hello?
Commander Hall?
Yeah.
I'm the man in control of the small army sitting on your doorstep.
translation.es: Estoy al mando del pequeño ejércitoque está en la puerta de entrada.

translation.en: Do you have a moment to chat?
If you want me on speaker, go ahead. I understand.
translation.es: Si quiere ponerme en el altavoz,adelante. Lo entiendo.

translation.en: Everyone should hear.
I should've done this earlier.
It would've saved us all a lot of time, sweat
translation.es: Nos hubiera ahorrado a todosmucho tiempo, sudor...

translation.en: and blood.
I have your compound surrounded.
Your power, your network,
all of your communications are down.
No one knows that you're in trouble, and no one's coming to help.
translation.es: Nadie sabe que están en problemas,y nadie vendrá a ayudarlos.

translation.en: Your officer spoke to my associate, Simone,
translation.es: Su oficial habló con mi socia,Simone...

translation.en: not the dispatch operator.
Hello.
The man you pulled out of a box belongs to me.
translation.es: El hombre que sacarondel contenedor me pertenece.

translation.en: Hand him over
and I'll go away.
Just like that?
Just like that.
Can't do it.
Scorpion...
I know you're listening.
Tell these people who I am.
translation.es: Diles a estas personas quién soy yo.

translation.en: His name is Lars Cohagen.
He runs a private military corporation
translation.es: Dirige una corporación militar privadaque se especializa...

translation.en: that specializes in dark ops. The kind that overthrow small countries?
Some not so small. Hm.
Now that we're all in the know,
translation.es: Ahora que estamos todos al tanto...

translation.en: why don't you come on out and spare the lives of these nice people?
translation.es: ...¿por qué no sale y ahorra las vidasde estas buenas personas?

translation.en: Let them return home and enjoy what's left of the holiday.
translation.es: Permítales regresar a su casay disfrutar lo que queda del feriado.

translation.en: They could still catch the fireworks.
translation.es: Todavía están a tiempode ver los fuegos artificiales.

translation.en: How many times are we going to go through this?
This is it.
This is our last dance.
I've heard this before.
Commander Hall, the man you're protecting is a consummate liar.
translation.es: Comandante Hall, el hombre al queprotege es un mentiroso consagrado.

translation.en: His skills of deception supersede even mine.
translation.es: Sus habilidades de engañodesbancan incluso a las mías.

translation.en: In fact, I will guarantee that he's lying to you right now.
translation.es: De hecho, le garantizo que le estámintiendo en este mismo momento.

translation.en: Has he told you there's one in your organization that's against you?
translation.es: ¿Ya le dijo que hay alguien desu organización que está en su contra?

translation.en: Or that he has information that could set the world ablaze?
translation.es: ¿O que él tiene informaciónque podría poner al mundo en llamas?

translation.en: He's a liar
and a killer and nothing more.
All your problems go away if you just
turn him over.
And I already told you,
I'm not doing that.
Commander, so this stranger's life
translation.es: Comandante... ...¿entonces la vida de este extrañoes más importante que la de su equipo?

translation.en: is more important to you than your team's?
translation.es: ...¿entonces la vida de este extrañoes más importante que la de su equipo?

translation.en: What about Daniel Chu?
David Jefferson?
Luis and Maria Gutierrez?
Carley and Rebecca?
Is Scorpion's life worth more to you than their lives?
translation.es: ¿La vida de Escorpión es más valiosapara usted que sus vidas?

translation.en: Are all their lives worth Scorpion's to you?
translation.es: ¿Las vidas de todos ellos equivalena la de Escorpión para usted?

translation.en: Enough. I'm coming out.
But before I do,
I want your guarantee.
No harm comes to anyone here, nor their families.
translation.es: Ninguna de estas personasserá lastimada, ni sus familias.

translation.en: You have my word.
I will be out in 10 minutes.
You'd better be.
ELSON: Commander, try the phone again. Maybe we have a live line out.
translation.es: Comandante, pruebe el teléfono.Tal vez tengamos una línea saliente.

translation.en: TRAVIS: No...
Shit.
TRAVIS: You're not giving yourself up.
translation.es: -Usted no va a entregarse.-Nunca dije que lo haría.

translation.en: I never said I was. I only said I was coming out.
translation.es: -Usted no va a entregarse.-Nunca dije que lo haría. Solo dije que saldría.

translation.en: You think you can take on this whole army alone? I work best alone.
translation.es: -¿Cree poder con su ejército usted solo?-Trabajo mejor solo.

translation.en: With the shields down, this place can withstand a riot.
translation.es: Con los escudos activados,este lugar puede soportar un motín.

translation.en: You don't have to go.
WARD: Hold on a second. I'm confused.
You giving yourself up or not? He's not.
We can't let him. HOOKS: Yes, we can.
Did you not see that army out there?
translation.es: ¿Acaso no viste el ejércitoque está afuera?

translation.en: We just lost Phil and Benson.
translation.es: Acabamos de perder a Phil y a Benson.

translation.en: I don't plan to join them because of this son of a bitch.
translation.es: No tengo planes de unirme a ellosdebido a este hijo de perra.

translation.en: You heard him, Commander.
He's threatening our families, and there's no backup.
translation.es: Está amenazando a nuestras familiasy no tenemos refuerzos.

translation.en: This guy's a fucking liar. He could be playing us. Let him go.
translation.es: Este tipo es un maldito mentiroso.Podría estar engañándonos. Déjelo ir.

translation.en: No. We're not giving in to this Lars asshole.
translation.es: No. No vamos a rendirnosante este imbécil de Lars.

translation.en: Not after all that's happened.
translation.es: No después de todo lo que sucedió.

translation.en: It ain't his fault a lunatic's shooting up the building.
translation.es: No es culpa suya que un lunáticoesté disparando al edificio.

translation.en: Maybe it is. We don't know.
translation.es: Tal vez sí. No lo sabemos.

translation.en: Scorpion could've escaped or killed us several times.
translation.es: Escorpión podría haberse escapadoo habernos matado varias veces.

translation.en: He didn't. I believe him.
translation.es: No lo hizo. Yo le creo.

translation.en: That just might mean that he needed our help to survive.
translation.es: Eso tal vez quiera decir que necesitabanuestra ayuda para sobrevivir.

translation.en: That doesn't disprove what Lars said.
translation.es: Eso no desmiente lo que dijo Lars.

translation.en: Believe Lars when he says he will stop at nothing
translation.es: Créanle a Lars cuando diceque nada lo detendrá...

translation.en: to find a way inside to get me.
translation.es: ...para encontrar la manerade entrar para venir por mí.

translation.en: If I do not come out now, that army outside,
translation.es: Si no salgo ahora,ese ejército que está ahí afuera...

translation.en: those phony agents,
they are just the tip of the iceberg.
You're right.
We'll put you by the back door.
translation.es: Lo pondremos en la puerta trasera.

translation.en: Only it won't be you.
Heh. In theory, it should work. I loaded everything you'll need on the laptop.
translation.es: En teoría, debería funcionar. Puse todolo necesario en la computadora portátil.

translation.en: You should be good to go.
I wanna thank you for your assistance today, Nicholas.
translation.es: Quiero agradecerte todala ayuda de hoy, Nicholas.

translation.en: Oh, my pleasure, sir.
Did you know that Scorpion and I used to be partners?
Right. You were saying.
It was great for a while,
and then five years ago in Berlin, he betrayed me.
translation.es: ...y luego, hace cinco añosme traicionó en Berlín.

translation.en: After all we'd been through.
translation.es: Después de todolo que habíamos pasado.

translation.en: You know, and I knew it.
I knew something was wrong, but I didn't react in time.
translation.es: Yo sabía que algo estaba mal,pero no reaccioné a tiempo.

translation.en: Since then, I've taken greater precaution in my business dealings, because
translation.es: Desde entonces, tomo mayoresprecauciones en mis negocios porque...

translation.en: no matter how much you think you know someone,
translation.es: ...no importa cuánto creasque conoces a alguien...

translation.en: they could stab you in the back.
Do you understand what I'm saying?
Yeah, I think so.
Good.
WARD: All right, let me get this straight.
translation.es: De acuerdo, a ver si entiendo esto.

translation.en: You wanna raise the door shields and let the army in?
translation.es: ¿Usted quiere levantar los escudosy dejar entrar al ejército?

translation.en: That's your plan? Not let them in. Lure them close, then ambush them.
translation.es: No dejarlos entrar. Atraerlospara que se acerquen y emboscarlos.

translation.en: Why won't that work?
Because it's batshit crazy.
TRAVIS: We're not turning this man over to mercenaries.
translation.es: Bueno, de ningún modo entregaremosa este hombre a los mercenarios.

translation.en: Once they're in the courtyard, we've got them trapped.
translation.es: Una vez que estén en el patio,están atrapados.

translation.en: How do you figure that?
The back door is located in the deepest part of the courtyard.
translation.es: La puerta trasera está ubicadaal fondo del patio.

translation.en: Here.
Now, about three dozen office windows look down onto it.
translation.es: Unas tres docenas de ventanasde oficinas miran en esa dirección.

translation.en: That's where we'll be.
We'll make them think we're handing you over.
To sell it, Elson will figure out a way to open the rear entrance shield.
translation.es: Para que sea creíble, Elson se ocuparáde abrir el escudo de la puerta trasera.

translation.en: Now, once they get eyes on the bait,
translation.es: Una vez que pongan sus ojosen la carnada...

translation.en: they're gonna move in underneath our hidden positions,
and that's when we hit 'em.
They'll be sitting ducks.
It's the first time the shields have ever been activated.
translation.es: Es la primera vezque se activan los escudos.

translation.en: I've never done, nor am I even sure
that isolated openings will work as you describe them.
translation.es: ...y no estoy seguro que funcionen asílas aperturas aisladas.

translation.en: Yeah. Well, you'll figure it out.
translation.es: Sí. Bueno, tendrás que pensar en algo.

translation.en: They'll be expecting something like that.
TRAVIS: Well, this is our only option.
translation.es: Sí. Bueno, es nuestra única opción.

translation.en: They got us boxed in.
We can't call out, and you said it yourself.
translation.es: No podemos hacer llamadas salientes,y usted lo dijo.

translation.en: It's only a matter of time till he finds his way in.
translation.es: Es solo cuestión de tiempo hastaque encuentre la manera de entrar.

translation.en: At least this way, it's on our own terms.
translation.es: Por lo menos,así es en nuestros términos.

translation.en: Look, guys, this isn't an order.
translation.es: Miren, muchachos,esto no es una orden.

translation.en: I'm not forcing you into this.
translation.es: No los estoy obligando a hacer esto.

translation.en: But I, for one, don't wanna sit around and let someone else determine my fate.
translation.es: Pero yo no quiero quedarme sentadoy dejar que otro determine mi destino.

translation.en: If I'm going out,
it's gonna be on my terms, not theirs.
translation.es: ...será en mis términos,no en los suyos.

translation.en: If this is what you want, I will need firepower.
translation.es: Si esto es lo que tú quieres,necesitaré potencia de fuego.

translation.en: TRAVIS: We've got every weapon known to man.
translation.es: Tenemos todas las armasconocidas por el hombre.

translation.en: What exactly are you looking for?
I will know it when I see it. TRAVIS: We aim to please.
translation.es: -Lo sabré cuando lo vea.-Nuestro objetivo es complacerlo.

translation.en: TRAVIS: In the meantime, spread out and load up.
translation.es: Mientras tanto,sepárense y carguen sus armas.

translation.en: Just because I'm browsing don't mean I'm giving up on you.
translation.es: Que esté mirando no quieredecir que renunciaré a ti.

translation.en: What the fuck do you do with that?
You don't want anything to do with that.
translation.es: Tú no quieres tenernada que ver con eso.

translation.en: That's when you got nothing to live for.
translation.es: Eso es para cuandono tienes ningún motivo para vivir.

translation.en: HOOKS: Hey.
Oh, never mind.
What did you find?
Excellent. WARD: Why?
Our regular radios still work.
He may have tapped into those frequencies.
He will not be able to do so with this model.
translation.es: No podrá hacerlo con este modelo.

translation.en: Okay. Everyone grab one.
You gotta change.
TRAVIS: How'd you get the name Scorpion, anyway?
I assume that's not on your birth certificate.
translation.es: Asumo que eso no estáen su certificado de nacimiento.

translation.en: SCORPION: You are assuming I have a birth certificate.
translation.es: Usted asume que yo tengoun certificado de nacimiento.

translation.en: Heh. All right, you're not gonna tell me your name.
translation.es: Usted asume que yo tengoun certificado de nacimiento. De acuerdo, no me dirá su nombre.

translation.en: At least you can tell me how you know Lars Cohagen.
translation.es: Por lo menos puede decirmecómo conoce a Lars Cohagen.

translation.en: We were once partners.
I never said I was a good man, Commander, just good at what I do.
translation.es: Nunca dije que fuera un buen hombre,comandante, soy bueno en lo que hago.

translation.en: You do not know me, Commander.
You should not be taking this risk.
Even holiday double-time ain't enough to deal with this shit today.
translation.es: Ni siquiera el pago doble del feriadoes suficiente para lidiar con esto.

translation.en: You know, the job is risk.
translation.es: Usted sabe, el trabajo es riesgo.

translation.en: It's not about or for you.
translation.es: No es por ustedni se trata de usted.

translation.en: Not any longer.
Our guys' blood's been spilled today.
translation.es: Hoy se derramó la sangrede nuestros hombres.

translation.en: Someone's gonna pay for that.
SCORPION: There is one thing you have not addressed.
translation.es: Hay una cosaque usted pasó por alto.

translation.en: The person on the inside who is working against us.
translation.es: La persona de adentroque trabaja en contra nuestra.

translation.en: When they attacked the van, they were waiting for us.
translation.es: Cuando atacaron la camioneta,nos estaban esperando.

translation.en: Someone told Lars you were taking me from the compound.
translation.es: Alguien le dijo a Larsque usted me sacaría del complejo.

translation.en: ELLEN [ON COMM]: Two-minute warning.
Copy that. Everyone get in position.
We go on my call. Copy that.
Good luck.
Never really believed in luck.
translation.es: Realmente nunca creí en la suerte.

translation.en: Well, good luck anyway.
translation.es: Bueno, buena suerte de todos modos.

translation.en: Everyone set? Know what they're doing?
ALL: Yes, sir.
Sof, you remember Suffolk, a few years back?
Yeah.
That was another supposedly cakewalk mission
translation.es: Esa fue otra misiónque supuestamente era pan comido...

translation.en: that turned into a shitshow.
What was it, 40 gangbangers against eight S.W.A.T.?
translation.es: ¿Cómo fue, 40 pandilleroscontra ocho miembros del S.W.A.T.?

translation.en: I tell people I never know how we survived that night.
translation.es: Siempre digo que no sécómo sobrevivimos esa noche.

translation.en: But I do know...
we're S.W.A.T.
We're the baddest motherfuckers on Earth.
translation.es: Somos los peores hijosde perra en la Tierra.

translation.en: TRAVIS: Let's get in position.
Take care of each other.
The least he could've done was give us the microchip to barter for our lives.
translation.es: Como mínimo podría darnos el microchippara canjearlo por nuestras vidas.

translation.en: There's no microchip. It's in his head.
translation.es: No hay ningún microchip.Está todo en su cabeza.

translation.en: Hey, make sure we're in position before--
Hey. It's not my first rodeo.
Don't fuck up.
How we looking?
When we get the go, I just hit enter,
and it'll raise the rear-entrance shield.
But not the rest of the building? Right. Just the rear entrance.
translation.es: -¿Pero no las del resto del edificio?-Correcto. Solo la entrada trasera.

translation.en: In theory.
In theory?
In theory.
MAN 1: Position! Hold that position!
MAN 2: All right, let's go.
MAN 1: Left, left, left.
SIMONE: No sign of Scorpion.
Commander, is your team ready?
Let's go around the horn.
Hooks, set.
Jefferson, set. York, set.
Gutierrez, set. Chu, set.
Ward, are you in position?
Ward?
Sorry, I was using the wrong mic.
We're all set.
Raise the shield. Copy.
It worked.
SIMONE: Right on time.
They're opening the shields by the rear entrance. Move in.
translation.es: Están abriendo el escudode la entrada trasera. Muévanse.

translation.en: TRAVIS [ON COMM]: Here they come. Get ready.
SIMONE: Third-floor window.
What is that?
Morse code.
Pull everyone back. It's a trap.
SIMONE [ON COMM]: Everyone move back. Now.
Whoa, whoa, whoa. He's stopping. Why is he stopping?
Hey!
TRAVIS: The fuck just happened?
Everybody fall back to the command center.
ELLEN [ON COMM]: Copy. Everyone fall back.
Fuck.
Elson, close the rear shields. I'm on it.
translation.es: -Elson, cierra el escudo trasero.-Estoy en eso.

translation.en: Where's everybody else? Ward, I don't know.
Scorpion's M.I.A.
Dwyer left a few minutes ago. Where?
translation.es: -Dwyer se fue hace algunos minutos.-¿A dónde?

translation.en: We saw a light at the third-floor window
translation.es: Vimos una luzen la ventana del tercer piso...

translation.en: and she just bolted. A flash of light?
translation.es: -...y se fue corriendo.-¿Una luz? ¿En qué ventana?

translation.en: Which window? Right there.
translation.es: -...y se fue corriendo.-¿Una luz? ¿En qué ventana? Justo ahí.

translation.en: Stay here. Keep an eye on everything outside.
translation.es: Quédense aquí.Vigilen todo lo que suceda afuera.

translation.en: Where are you going? Find the big guy.
Scorpion, come in.
Scorpion, do you copy?
Get up.
I'm gonna let you out of here.
translation.es: Voy a dejarlo salir de aquí.

translation.en: You're gonna tell Lars I'm gonna find another way to give him Scorpion.
translation.es: Le dirá a Lars que encontraréotra manera de entregarle a Escorpión.

translation.en: No one else needs to die.
translation.es: No es necesario que muera nadie más.

translation.en: Shit, it was you.
Yeah, I'll tell him. Lead the way.
translation.es: Sí, yo se lo diré. Te sigo.

translation.en: WARD: The amount is the same upon delivery. Fifty million. That hasn't changed.
translation.es: El monto es el mismo a la entrega.Cincuenta millones. Eso no cambió.

translation.en: Fifty million's a sweet fucking payday for a cop.
translation.es: Cincuenta millones es un día de pagoextraordinario para un policía.

translation.en: Those DEA assholes are always skimming off the top.
translation.es: Esos imbéciles de la DEAsiempre se llevan lo mejor.

translation.en: About time I got some. Of course, it is.
translation.es: -Ya es hora que me toque a mí.-Por supuesto.

translation.en: Hey. This mess is Hall's fault. If he had handed over Scorpion--
translation.es: -Ya es hora que me toque a mí.-Por supuesto. Este caos es culpa de Hall.Si hubiera entregado a Escorpión...

translation.en: What the hell's the plan on getting me out of here?
translation.es: ¿Cuál es el plan para sacarme de aquí?

translation.en: We're gonna cut the power to the mainframe.
translation.es: Vamos a cortar la energíade la computadora central.

translation.en: Once the shields are up, Lars can take care of the rest.
translation.es: Con los escudos levantados,Lars puede ocuparse del resto.

translation.en: Where are the controls? Engineering room.
translation.es: -¿Dónde están los controles?-En la sala de ingeniería.

translation.en: Thanks.
ELLEN: Ward?
Fuck.
TRAVIS: Ellen.
You all right? Yeah.
It was Ward.
I saw him talking to Franklin before Franklin killed him.
translation.es: Lo vi hablando con Franklinantes que Franklin lo asesinara.

translation.en: Where'd he go? In there.
Yeah? Ready?
See that?
CHU: What just happened? Security feed's been cut.
translation.es: -¿Qué acaba de suceder?-Se cortaron las cámaras de seguridad.

translation.en: We're blind outside now, too. You said the feed was internal.
translation.es: -Ahora tampoco vemos nada de afuera.-Dijiste que la transmisión era interna.

translation.en: It is.
Without it, I've lost control of our security system. What does that mean?
translation.es: -No controlo el sistema de seguridad.-¿Qué significa eso?

translation.en: What I mean is the same crazy fuck that's been attacking us can open our shields,
translation.es: Que el mismo loco que nos atacóahora puede levantar nuestros escudos...

translation.en: and there is nothing that we can do about it.
Closer.
Clear.
What the fuck is happening? The shields are raising.
translation.es: -¿Qué diablos está sucediendo?-Los escudos se están levantando.

translation.en: YORK: Can you stop it? ELSON: No.
What do you think he's gonna fucking do, huh?
Oh, yeah.
ELLEN: Travis!
SIMONE: Intel from Berlin.
Dead or alive no longer matters.
translation.es: Ya no importa si está vivo o muerto.

translation.en: I will go in there and fucking kill him myself if I have to!
translation.es: Entraré y lo mataré yo mismosi es necesario, maldición.

translation.en: Go!
Everyone, move in.
SIMONE [ON COMM]: Shoot to kill Scorpion on sight.
translation.es: Disparen a matar a Escorpiónapenas lo vean.

translation.en: MAN: Let's go! Let's go!
Oh, shit.
Everyone fall back. Let's go. Come on.
TRAVIS: Go, go, go, go, go, go!
Elson, come on.
MAN: After those guys! Let's go!
TRAVIS: Clear!
Move, move, move, move!
YORK: Let's go! Let's go!
Man down!
HOOKS: Jefferson, come on!
Go!
Later, bitches.
Get over yourself.
Let's go. Go.
Duck.
Oh, you meant that kind of firepower.
translation.es: Se refería a esa clasede potencia de fuego.

translation.en: SCORPION: I have something to show you.
The way out.
I found a maintenance tunnel.
TRAVIS: Yeah, it's been sealed.
SCORPION: Not anymore.
Nope. Fuck that. Hey, it's either that,
translation.es: -No. Al diablo con eso.-Oye, es eso...

translation.en: or you go back out there to face a bunch of badass dudes shooting at you.
translation.es: ...o regresas a enfrentar los disparosde esa turba de desgraciados.

translation.en: All right, give me a boost. Okay.
ELSON: Fuck.
CHU: Right behind you, Elson. ELSON: Okay.
Travis. I'm going after Dwyer.
No way I'm leaving one of our own behind.
translation.es: No dejaré a uno de los nuestros.

translation.en: Get 'em to safety, okay?
You don't know how many of them are still up there.
translation.es: Tú no sabes cuántosmás de ellos quedan arriba.

translation.en: Or if she's even alive. I'm gonna be fine.
Go on. I'm not letting you go alone.
He won't be.
I'll call for backup as soon as I can.
You don't have to do this. I know.
You didn't have to come back just for us.
translation.es: No tenía que regresarsolo por nosotros.

translation.en: I didn't.
TRAVIS: Looks like everybody cleared out.
SCORPION: Unlikely.
Lars would never give up.
translation.es: Lars nunca se daría por vencido.

translation.en: At least I got you.
Now let us see if you can finish the job.
translation.es: Ahora veamossi puedes terminar el trabajo.

translation.en: Hey.
[SIGHS] Hey.
What happened? It's over.
Good guys won. Come on.
TRAVIS: We lost York and Jefferson.
translation.es: Perdimos a York y a Jefferson.

translation.en: ELLEN: Oh, God, no. TRAVIS: Yeah.
ELLEN: What about Scorpion? TRAVIS: Yeah, he's still alive...
somehow.
Still no signal? TRAVIS: No.
Gutierrez said she'd call it in when they got out.
translation.es: Gutierrez dijo que llamaríaapenas salieran del túnel.

translation.en: TRAVIS: Cell towers must still be jammed.
translation.es: Las torres celularestodavía deben estar bloqueadas...

translation.en: But it shouldn't be too long now,
which means you need to disappear.
I don't know if I have it in me to run anymore.
translation.es: Ya no sé si tengo ganasde seguir huyendo.

translation.en: I am constantly running.
That and all the people trying to kill me...
translation.es: Eso y todas las personasque quieren matarme...

translation.en: It's exhausting. [CHUCKLES]
You got all that money in your head. Why not just retire?
translation.es: Tiene todo ese dinero en su cabeza.¿Por qué no se retira?

translation.en: That is blood money.
As a matter of fact...
Dude, what the fuck?
Take it.
What the hell is it?
SCORPION: It's what all the fuss is about.
translation.es: Todo este escándalo es por esto.

translation.en: A microchip.
What's in your head. That's clever.
translation.es: Lo que está en su cabeza.Qué inteligente.

translation.en: And now it's better in your hands.
translation.es: Ahora está mejor en sus manos.

translation.en: ELLEN: Late last night, a shipping container arrived at Monfell from Bogotá.
translation.es: Tarde anoche, llegóun contenedor de Bogotá a Monfell.

translation.en: Yeah, what'd he turn out to be? A guy in a box.
translation.es: Sí, ¿y qué resultó ser?Un tipo en un contenedor.

translation.en: ELLEN: The least he could've done was given us the microchip to barter for our lives.
translation.es: Podría darnos el microchippara canjearlo por nuestras vidas.

translation.en: TRAVIS: There's no microchip.
Ellen, what are you doing? It's nothing personal, Travis.
translation.es: -¿Qué estás haciendo, Ellen?-No es nada personal, Travis.

translation.en: ELLEN: You should have just handed Scorpion over, Travis.
No one was supposed to get hurt. You should've just let it go.
translation.es: Se suponía que nadie saldría herido.Deberías haberlo dejado ir.

translation.en: Don't.
Don't.
It's over.
MAN: What did I say?
Good? Yeah.
SOPHIA: FBI was onto her.
And she knew.
I never liked her.
What is that?
A souvenir.
MAN: Excuse me, Commander.
Can I ask you to come and identify the body?
translation.es: ¿Puedo pedirle que vengaa identificar el cuerpo?

translation.en: MAN: Is this the man known as Scorpion?
That's-- That's him.
MAN: Okay. Take him away, guys.
Is there something you wanna tell me?
TRAVIS: Yeah, but for your protection, I'd better not.
translation.es: Sí, pero será mejor que nolo haga por tu protección.

translation.en: The less you know...
TRAVIS [ON PHONE]: Hey, hon.
How's the party going? CARLEY: Travis, oh, my God.
I've been worried sick. Are you okay? TRAVIS: Yeah, I'm-- I'm fine. I'm on my way.
translation.es: -Estaba preocupadísima. ¿Estás bien?-Sí, estoy... Estoy bien. Voy en camino.

translation.en: I'll tell you about it when I get up there, okay? I love you.
translation.es: Te contaré todo cuando llegue,¿de acuerdo? Te amo.

translation.en: CARLEY: Purple. BECKY: P-U-R-P-L-E.
CARLEY: Three. BECKY: One, two, three.
Four. Four.
Hi, Daddy.
Hi, sweetheart. Oh. You look like you could use a beer.
translation.es: -Hola, cariño.-Creo que te vendría bien una cerveza.

translation.en: Or 20.
Hey, what's this? Hey.
Yeah.
TRAVIS: This is enough.
For me.
Just you...
and her.
I don't need anything more.
But I'm pregnant.
Are you kidding me? Surprise.
TRAVIS: Is that what you were trying to tell me? Yeah.
Did you know about this?
Yeah, I could tell.
The two of you...
TRAVIS [ON PHONE]: Hall here.
MAN [ON PHONE]: Commander, we got a shitshow brewing
translation.es: Habla Hall. Comandante, tenemos una situaciónen el edificio del capitolio en Olympia.

translation.en: at the capitol building in downtown Olympia.
translation.es: Comandante, tenemos una situaciónen el edificio del capitolio en Olympia.

translation.en: We need you and your team on-scene ASAP.
translation.es: Lo necesitamos a usted y a su equipoen el lugar cuando antes.

translation.en: Closed Captions: Katie Radford
